entry.title: Combined summary - New idea on decentralized identity and truth (Re: Numerifides)
entry.summary: Unfortunately, the provided context is too brief and lacks sufficient information to generate a detailed summary. However, some information can be gleaned from the text.The Lightning Network is considering a proposed feature called Atlas, which would enable decentralized, trusted hosting of data mappings at a cost that increases with longer paths or more queries. The database could be shared among nodes for redundancy, and future use cases for non-mapping information were also discussed. However, concerns about attackers inventing fake target audiences and advertisers needing proof that their advertisements reached their intended audience were raised. An alternative idea involving advertiser nodes was proposed to address these concerns but was deemed too centralized.Tyler H's proposal for Atlas as a punishment mechanism for eltoo channels in the Lightning Network is being discussed on GitHub. Unfortunately, without additional information or links, it is challenging to provide a comprehensive summary.
